Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

multidplyr (development version)

multidplyr 0.1.2

  • cluster_call() gains a simplify argument - use this to request that the result should be simplified (#136).

multidplyr 0.1.1

CRAN release: 2021-12-01

  • Fixed problems identified as part of working on dplyr 1.0.8.

multidplyr 0.1.0

CRAN release: 2021-02-08

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.
